#summary Adding ExifTool to your Maven Repository
#labels maven,install

= Download =

Download ExifTool from here:
http://www.sno.phy.queensu.ca/~phil/exiftool/

Extract the binary file (this assumes Windows at the moment).

= Maven Installation =

Type this command:

<code>
mvn install:install-file -Dfile=[location-of-exiftool.exe] -DgroupId=exif-tool -DartifactId=exif-tool -Dversion=6.96 -Dpackaging=exe -DgeneratePom=true
</code>

That should be good.
